attributes.action: To create a central & permanent memorial in Whitehall/Westmisnter.
attributes.additional_details: The government should recognise the sacrifices of the people through this tragic time. A fitting memorial & permanent reminder of the lives lost, the NHS & frontline workers & the sacrifices the people in the UK have made through lockdowns would be a fitting tribute where people in the future could pay their respects, remember & reflect.
attributes.background: To debate the way the people of the United Kingdom have come together to defeat the virus & honour the memory of all including those that lost their lives at this tragic time. To create a permanent memorial in Whitehall / Westminster to honour the sacrifices made & the lives lost during pandemic.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for Westminster City Council.
